EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Forrester_TEIofPCF_AR_Q317.TG Do not Touch - Download
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for viewing the Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry report
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for viewing the The Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry Forrester study, we hope it inspires you to start building software people love! For more resources from Pivotal, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources]]>, where you can find customer case studies, white papers, webinars, analyst reports, and eBooks. And please stay in touch <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>, we love hearing from you! Thank you, The Pivotal Team
For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[http://info.pivotal.io/Fu0UN00cl0I002j0000JCA0]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
